glsa.title: GNU Wget: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: An absolute path traversal vulnerability could lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols.

description.p: An absolute path traversal vulnerability has been found in GNU Wget.

impact.p: A remote FTP server is able to write to arbitrary files, and consequently execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU Wget users should upgrade to the latest version:
